DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical investigation evaluate efficacy immunologic effect non-pharmacological exercise intervention ( pushup ) compare oral NSAID ( ibuprofen ) oral placebo decrease local injection site inflammation symptom delay pain , erythema , edema impact serologic antibody immune response influenza vaccine receipt .
DOC.brief_title: Do NSAIDS Executing Exercise Decrease Local Erythema , Site Swelling & Pain After INoculation
DOC.detailed_description: The study evaluate efficacy immunologic effect non-pharmacological exercise intervention ( pushup ) compare oral NSAID ( ibuprofen ) blind oral placebo decrease local injection site inflammation symptom delay pain , erythema , edema impact serologic antibody immune response influenza vaccine receipt . A healthy military cohort randomly assign either perform pushup consistent army physical fitness score , take blinded oral medication NSAID ( ibuprofen ) oral placebo . The study require three visit assessment : day vaccine receipt , 48-72 hour later 21 -28 day later . The assessment visit include injection site inspection , injection site photograph , completion symptom diary validate pain scale laboratory blood specimen first third visit measure antibody level change . The exercise participant also require provide 1-2 fingerstick blood sample evaluate lactate , byproduct anaerobic exercise measure level exercise effort achieve anaerobic metabolism . The study evaluate either intervention impact perceived delayed pain , physical sign inflammation antibody response measure serology .
DOC.criteria: Must : 1 . Be Active Duty Service Members . 2. least 18 year age old . 3 . Be require eligible inactivated influenza vaccine receipt . 4 . Be willing able complete study protocol requirement . 5 . Have current Womack Army Medical Center Flu Screening Form medical clearance receive influenza vaccination . Must Not : 1 . Have already receive influenza vaccine season . 2 . Have receive type vaccine previous 72 hour . 3 . Be medical profile result current profile exemption Physical Training Upper 2 Upper 3 . ( Upper extremity injury illness ) 4 . Have preexist symptom injury infection local symptom would interfere site assessment . 5 . Be pregnant . 6 . Have history allergy , intolerance , stomach bleed medical exclusion ibuprofen . 7 . Have history stroke coronary artery disease , uncontrolled high blood pressure abnormal heart beat . 8 . Has take topical oral pain medication follow medication class past 24 hour prior start study : oral acetaminophen , opioids , tramadol , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAID ) acetylsalicylic acid ( ASA ) topical pain reliever counterirritant menthol , methyl salicylate , camphor menthol , capsaicin . 9 . Have chronic acute illness treatment cause immunological suppression current oral steroid therapy , malignancy chemotherapy lung disease . ( include control asthma ) 10 . Currently participate study
